titles.title: Medicare Home Health Flexibility Act of 2015
A bill to permit occupational therapists to conduct the initial assessment visit under a Medicare home health plan of care for certain rehabilitation cases.
Medicare Home Health Flexibility Act of 2015

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Medicare Home Health Flexibility Act of 2015
This bill establishes circumstances under which an occupational therapist may conduct the initial assessment visit for an individual who is eligible for home health services under Medicare. Specifically, an occupational therapist may conduct the assessment if the physician's referral order does not include skilled nursing care but does include: (1) occupational therapy, and (2) physical therapy or speech language pathology.
